Name: iso-Sphere
About the game: Wishlist our new game! / Description A simple and colorful ball-rolling platformer with elements of puzzle game. Complete all five unique worlds and beat time records on all 68 levels. Features: 68 levels spread over 5 themed worlds. Stars to collect and time records to set. Ball skins to choose from. Partial gamepad support. Original soundtrack.
